column7: This course will develop an understanding of the most fundamental accounting concepts and provide key building blocks necessary for intermediate and advanced financial statement analysis. It is designed to provide a basic but practical application of financial analyses commonly performed by industry professionals. 2 graduate hours. No professional credit. Credit is not given for FIN 504 and FIN 580 (58811), Section FS.
column9: 2 graduate hours. No professional credit. Credit is not given for FIN 504 and FIN 580 (58811), Section FS.
